meanings.definition: The skillful arrangement or fitting together of parts in a harmonious whole.
meanings.sent1: The concinnities of the puzzle pieces made it easy to solve.
meanings.sent2: The concinnities of the garden design impressed all the visitors.
meanings.sent3: She admired the concinnities of the Lego structure her son built.
meanings.sent4: The concinnities of the orchestra's performance were like a perfectly woven tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The concinnities of the dance routine left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Elegance or neatness of design or arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The concinnities of her outfit caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The concinnities of the room decor gave it a luxurious feel.
meanings.sent3: The concinnities of the cake decoration made it almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The concinnities of the sunset painted the sky in breathtaking colors.
meanings.sent5: The concinnities of the calligraphy on the invitation were exquisite.

meanings.definition: The quality of being well-organized or coherent.
meanings.sent1: The concinnities of his argument made it convincing.
meanings.sent2: The concinnities of the report made it easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: The concinnities of the bookshelf arrangement made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The concinnities of the city's layout were like a well-crafted map.
meanings.sent5: The concinnities of the plan ensured its success.
